actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to make it more consistent with the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972.

summary.text: Provides, under the Endangered Species Act, that specified prohibited acts shall not apply with respcet to any marine mammal taken or imported before December 21, 1972.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to make it more consistent with the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972.
